TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ProgressBar extends System.Windows.Forms.Control
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ProgressBar extends System.Windows.Forms.Control
Public NotInheritable Class ProgressBar Inherits Control
public ref class ProgressBar sealed : System::Windows::Forms::Control

summary.span: 表示 Windows 进度栏控件。

span.span: Represents a Windows progress bar control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件以下列 三种样式之一直观地指示长时间操作的进度：A control visually indicates the progress of a lengthy operation in one of three styles: - 从左到右的步骤增加的分段块。Segmented blocks that increase in steps from left to right. - 从左到右填充的连续条形。A continuous bar that fills in from left to right. - 以字幕方式滚动的块 。A block that scrolls across a in a marquee fashion. 属性确定所显示的样式 。The property determines the style of that is displayed. 请注意， 控件只能水平定向。Note that the control can only be oriented horizontally. 有关如何创建垂直方向的示例 ，请参阅 类。For an example of how to create a vertically oriented , see the class. 当应用程序执行任务（例如，复制文件或打印文档）时，通常会使用该控件。The control is typically used when an application performs tasks such as copying files or printing documents. 如果没有视觉提示，应用程序的用户可能会认为应用程序无响应。Users of an application might consider an application unresponsive if there is no visual cue. 通过 在你的应用程序中使用，你可以向用户发出警报，指出应用程序正在执行长时间的任务，且应用程序仍在响应。By using the in your application, you alert the user that the application is performing a lengthy task and that the application is still responding. 和 属性定义用于表示任务进度的值的范围。The and properties define the range of values to represent the progress of a task. 属性通常设置为值0，并且 属性通常设置为指示任务完成的值。The property is typically set to a value of 0, and the property is typically set to a value indicating the completion of a task. 例如，若要在复制一组文件时正确地显示进度，可以将 属性设置为要复制的文件的总数。For example, to properly display the progress when copying a group of files, the property could be set to the total number of files to be copied. 属性表示应用程序完成操作的进度。The property represents the progress that the application has made toward completing the operation. 所显示的值 仅接近属性的当前值 。The value displayed by the only approximates the current value of the property. 根据的大小 ， 属性将确定何时显示下一个块或增加条形的大小。Based on the size of the , the property determines when to display the next block or increase the size of the bar. 除了 直接更改属性以外，还可以通过多种方式来修改显示的值 。There are a number of ways to modify the value displayed by the other than changing the property directly. 您可以使用 属性来指定特定的值以便递增 属性，然后调用 方法来递增值。You can use the property to specify a specific value to increment the property by, and then call the method to increment the value. 若要更改增量值，可以使用 方法并指定一个值，以便为 属性递增。To vary the increment value, you can use the method and specify a value with which to increment the property. > [!NOTE] > 在 和更高版本上启用视觉样式时，将不遵循的和对的更改 [!INCLUDE[WinXpFamily](~/includes/winxpfamily-md.md)] 。 and changes for the will not be honored when visual styles are enabled on [!INCLUDE[WinXpFamily](~/includes/winxpfamily-md.md)] and above. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 控件显示文件复制操作的进度。The following code example uses a control to display the progress of a file copy operation. 该示例使用 和 属性来指定的范围，该范围 等效于要复制的文件数。The example uses the and properties to specify a range for the that is equivalent to the number of files to copy. 此代码还将 属性与方法一起使用 ，以在 复制文件时递增的值。The code also uses the property with the method to increment the value of the as a file is copied. 此示例要求你创建一个 名 `pBar1` 为的，该控件是在中创建的， 并且有一个名为 (创建的方法，该方法将 `CopyFile` 返回一个布尔值，指示文件复制操作已成功完成，) 执行文件复制操作。This example requires that you have a control created called `pBar1` that is created within a and that there is a method created called `CopyFile` (that returns a Boolean value indicating the file copy operation was completed successfully) that performs the file copy operation. 此代码还要求创建包含要复制的文件的字符串数组，并将其传递给 `CopyWithProgress` 在此示例中定义的方法，并且该方法是从中的其他方法或事件调用的 。The code also requires that an array of strings containing the files to copy is created and passed to the `CopyWithProgress` method defined in the example and that the method is called from another method or event in the . [!code-cpp[ProgressBarOverview#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBarOverview/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ProgressBarOverview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBarOverview/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ProgressBarOverview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBarOverview/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Increment(int32 value) cil managed

param.name: value
param.span: 增加进度栏的当前位置所根据的数量。

span.span: The amount by which to increment the progress bar's current position.

summary.span: 按指定的数量增加进度栏的当前位置。

span.span: Advances the current position of the progress bar by the specified amount.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法，可以按特定量递增进度栏的值。The method enables you to increment the value of the progress bar by a specific amount. 此递增进度栏的方法类似于将 属性与方法结合使用 。This method of incrementing the progress bar is similar to using the property with the method. 属性指定的当前位置 。The property specifies the current position of the . 如果在调用方法后， 属性大于属性的值 ，则属性将 保留在属性的值上 。If, after calling the method, the property is greater than the value of the property, the property remains at the value of the property. 如果在 使用参数中指定的负值调用方法后，属性 `value` 小于属性的值 ，则 属性保留在属性的值上 。If, after calling the method with a negative value specified in the `value` parameter, the property is less than the value of the property, the property remains at the value of the property. 由于 对象的样式设置为 显示持续滚动条而不是其样式，因此不 需要调用， 将引发 。Because a object whose style is set to displays a continuously scrolling bar instead of its , calling is unnecessary and will raise an . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法和 属性在的事件中递增的值 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method and the property to increment the value of a in the event of a . 该示例还 在中显示属性 以提供的文本表示形式 。The example also displays the property in a to provide a textual representation of the . 此示例要求您具有一个名为的 控件 `progressBar1` 和一个 包含名为的控件 `statusBarPanel1` 。This example requires that you have a control, named `progressBar1`, and a control that contains a , named `statusBarPanel1`. `time` 必须作为成员添加到窗体中。The , named `time`, must be added to the form as a member. [!code-cpp[ProgressBar.Increment#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBar.Increment/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ProgressBar.Increment#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBar.Increment/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ProgressBar.Increment#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBar.Increment/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置进度块在进度栏内滚动所用的时间段，以毫秒为单位。

span.span: Gets or sets the time period, in milliseconds, that it takes the progress block to scroll across the progress bar.

value.span: 进度块在进度栏内滚动所用的时间段，以毫秒为单位。

span.span: The time period, in milliseconds, that it takes the progress block to scroll across the progress bar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Marquee 样式的进度指示器不显示进度;相反，它指示操作是通过在进度栏上移动进度块来完成的。A marquee-style progress indicator does not display progress; instead it indicates that an operation is occurring by moving the progress block across the progress bar. 由于字幕动画速度是一个时间段，将值设置为较高的值会导致速度降低，并使数值越小，速度越快。Since the marquee animation speed is a time period, setting the value to a higher number results in a slower speed and a lower number results in a faster speed.

span.span: The indicated time period is less than 0.

summary.span: 获取或设置控件范围的最大值。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum value of the range of the control.
The maximum value of the range.
The default is 100.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指定属性的上限 。This property specifies the upper limit of the property. 当属性的值更改时，将重新 绘制控件以反映控件的新范围。When the value of the property is changed, the control is redrawn to reflect the new range of the control. 当属性的值 等于属性的值时 ，将完全填充进度栏。When the value of the property is equal to the value of the property, the progress bar is completely filled. 您可以使用此属性， 通过设置 属性或使用 或 方法) 指示操作已完成，来指定属性必须 (的值。You can use this property to specify a value to which the property must be set (by setting the property or using the or methods) to indicate that an operation is complete. 例如，可以将属性的值设置 为文件复制操作中的文件总数。For example, you can set the value of the property to the total number of files in a file copy operation. 每次复制文件时，都 可以将属性增加1，直到复制文件总数。Each time a file is copied, the property can be increased by 1 until the total number of files is copied. 此时，将完全填充进度栏。At that point, the progress bar would be completely filled. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 控件显示文件复制操作的进度。The following code example uses a control to display the progress of a file copy operation. 该示例使用 和 属性来指定的范围，该范围 等效于要复制的文件数。The example uses the and properties to specify a range for the that is equivalent to the number of files to copy. 此代码还将 属性与方法一起使用 ，以在 复制文件时递增的值。The code also uses the property with the method to increment the value of the as a file is copied. 此示例要求你创建一个 名 `pBar1` 为的，该控件是在中创建的， 并且有一个名为 (创建的方法，该方法将 `CopyFile` 返回一个布尔值，指示文件复制操作已成功完成，) 执行文件复制操作。This example requires that you have a control created called `pBar1` that is created within a and that there is a method created called `CopyFile` (that returns a Boolean value indicating the file copy operation was completed successfully) that performs the file copy operation. 此代码还要求创建包含要复制的文件的字符串数组，并将其传递给 `CopyWithProgress` 在此示例中定义的方法，并且该方法是从中的其他方法或事件调用的 。The code also requires that an array of strings containing the files to copy is created and passed to the `CopyWithProgress` method defined in the example and that the method is called from another method or event in the . [!code-cpp[ProgressBarOverview#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBarOverview/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ProgressBarOverview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBarOverview/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ProgressBarOverview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBarOverview/VB/form1.vb#1)]

span.span: The value specified is less than 0.

The minimum value of the range.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指定属性的下限 。This property specifies the lower limit of the property. 当属性的值更改时，将重新 绘制控件以反映控件的新范围。When the value of the property is changed, the control is redrawn to reflect the new range of the control. 当属性的值 等于属性的值时 ，进度条为空。When the value of the property is equal to the value of the property, the progress bar is empty. 若要更改进度栏的值，请使用 带有方法的属性 ，使用 方法，或直接设置属性的值 。To change the value of the progress bar, use the property with the method, use the method, or set the value of the property directly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 控件显示文件复制操作的进度。The following code example uses a control to display the progress of a file copy operation. 该示例使用 和 属性来指定的范围，该范围 等效于要复制的文件数。The example uses the and properties to specify a range for the that is equivalent to the number of files to copy. 此代码还将 属性与方法一起使用 ，以在 复制文件时递增的值。The code also uses the property with the method to increment the value of the as a file is copied. 此示例需要在中创建一个 名 `pBar1` 为的控件，该控件是在中创建的 ，并且有一个名为 (的方法，该方法 `CopyFile` 返回一个布尔值，该值指示文件复制操作已成功完成，) 执行文件复制操作。This example requires that you have a control created called `pBar1` that is created within a , and that there is a method created called `CopyFile` (that returns a Boolean value indicating the file copy operation was completed successfully) that performs the file copy operation. 此代码还要求创建包含要复制的文件的字符串数组，并将其传递给 `CopyWithProgress` 在此示例中定义的方法，并在中从另一个方法或事件调用此方法 。The code also requires that an array of strings containing the files to copy is created and passed to the `CopyWithProgress` method defined in the example, and that the method is called from another method or event in the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 当 在派生类中重写时，请确保调用基类的 方法，以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class' method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 按照 属性的数量增加进度栏的当前位置。

span.span: Advances the current position of the progress bar by the amount of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将进度栏的值增加由属性指定的量 。The method increments the value of the progress bar by the amount specified by the property. 您可以使用 属性来指定操作中每个已完成任务更改进度栏值的量。You can use the property to specify the amount that each completed task in an operation changes the value of the progress bar. 例如，如果要复制一组文件，则可能需要将属性的值设置 为1，并将属性的值设置为 要复制的文件的总数。For example, if you are copying a group of files, you might want to set the value of the property to 1 and the value of the property to the total number of files to copy. 在复制每个文件时，可以调用 方法，以通过属性的值递增进度栏 。When each file is copied, you can call the method to increment the progress bar by the value of the property. 如果希望更灵活地控制进度栏的值，可以使用 方法或直接设置属性的值 。If you want to have more flexible control of the value of the progress bar, you can use the method or set the value of the property directly. 属性指定的当前位置 。The property specifies the current position of the . 如果在调用方法后， 属性大于属性的值 ，则属性将 保留在属性的值上 。If, after calling the method, the property is greater than the value of the property, the property remains at the value of the property. 如果在 使用指定的负值调用方法后 ， 属性小于属性的值 ，则 属性保留在属性的值上 。If, after calling the method with a negative value specified in , the property is less than the value of the property, the property remains at the value of the property. 由于 对象的样式设置为 显示持续滚动条而不是其样式，因此不 需要调用， 将引发 。Because a object whose style is set to displays a continuously scrolling bar instead of its , calling is unnecessary and will raise an . ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 控件显示文件复制操作的进度。The following code example uses a control to display the progress of a file copy operation. 该示例使用 和 属性来指定的范围，该范围 等效于要复制的文件数。The example uses the and properties to specify a range for the that is equivalent to the number of files to copy. 此代码还将 属性与方法一起使用 ，以在 复制文件时递增的值。The code also uses the property with the method to increment the value of the as a file is copied. 此示例需要在中创建一个 名 `pBar1` 为的控件，该控件是在中创建的 ，并且有一个名为 (的方法，该方法 `CopyFile` 返回一个布尔值，该值指示文件复制操作已成功完成，) 执行文件复制操作。This example requires that you have a control created called `pBar1` that is created within a , and that there is a method created called `CopyFile` (that returns a Boolean value indicating the file copy operation was completed successfully) that performs the file copy operation. 此代码还要求创建包含要复制的文件的字符串数组，并将其传递给 `CopyWithProgress` 在此示例中定义的方法，并在中从另一个方法或事件调用此方法 。The code also requires that an array of strings containing the files to copy is created and passed to the `CopyWithProgress` method defined in the example, and that the method is called from another method or event in the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `ProgressBar1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ProgressBar1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的最小值和最大值 由 和属性指定 。The minimum and maximum values of the property are specified by the and properties. 此属性使您可以直接递增或递减进度栏的值。This property enables you to increment or decrement the value of the progress bar directly. 若要在控件的值中执行一致的增长 ，可以将 属性与方法一起使用 。To perform consistent increases in the value of the control you can use the property with the method. 若要按不同的数量增加进度栏值，请使用 方法。To increase the progress bar value by varying amounts, use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法和 属性在的事件中递增的值 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method and the property to increment the value of a in the event of a . 该示例还 在中显示属性 以提供的文本表示形式 。The example also displays the property in a to provide a textual representation of the . 此示例要求您具有一个名为的 控件 `progressBar1` 和一个 包含名为的控件 `statusBarPanel1` 。This example requires that you have a control, named `progressBar1`, and a control that contains a , named `statusBarPanel1`. `time` 必须作为成员添加到窗体中。The , named `time`, must be added to the form as a member. [!code-cpp[ProgressBar.Increment#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBar.Increment/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ProgressBar.Increment#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBar.Increment/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ProgressBar.Increment#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBar.Increment/VB/form1.vb#1)]

exception.span: 指定的值小于 属性的值。

span.span: The value specified is less than the value of the property.
